data.sentence: The word فَإِنْ comes from the root ا ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كَانَ comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.
data.sentence: The word كَيْدٌ comes from the root ك ي د and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.
data.sentence: The word فَكِيدُونِ comes from the root ك ي د and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Dal) To be about to, be just on the point of, be well nigh, intend, wish.
